label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/high
notes.text: Users upgrading from versions earlier than v0.12.0 with the txt registry should run v0.13.5 at least once with the --once flag to avoid a regression where text registry migration is broken.

label: kind/feature
impact/high
notes.text: Added support for Traefik 2's IngressRoute, IngressRouteTCP, and IngressRouteUDP.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added serialization and deserialization support to DomainFilter.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added AWS API Gateway endpoint zone ID mappings.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug in the Civo provider to avoid infinite record creation.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed handling of records produced by toNewTXTName in toEndpoint.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Migrated metadata from TXT to DynamoDB registries.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added cache based on DNS zone SOA value.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for ingress-backed Istio gateways.

label: kind/feature
impact/high
notes.text: Added support for workload identity using azidentity.
